mapper.delete: delete from member_reply where rno=#{rno} and username=#{username}
mapper.update: update member_reply set dereply=#{dereply}, deupdatedate=sysdate where rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, contentid, dereply, dereplydate, deupdatedate from(select /*+INDEX(member_reply idx_reply)*/ rownum rn, rno, contentid, dereply, username, dereplydate, deupdate from member_reply where contentid=#{contentid} and rownum <= #{cri.page}*#{cri.amount}) where rn > (#cri.page}-1)*#{cri.amount}
select count(*) from member_reply where contentid=#{contentid}
